_header: Be thee lief other be thee loath
Subjects: transitoriness, of life; human life, transitory nature of

CULGg432.Transcription:
Be þe lef oþer be þe loþþis worldes wele al
                    agoþVnder night and vnder dayÞine daies fluten a
                    wayþise beþ tueye þinges strongeþat euer ich man
                    heldeþ in honde
CULGg432.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.160.
